item.title: How to Join
item.description: Jump In and Join The Fun Our Server IPs Our Rules Suggested Launchers FTB App CurseForge There used to be a number of choices as to what launchers you could use to connect to servers with, however, we've curated the above links and guides to enable you to be able to connect to our servers successfully. If you need further assistance with using one of the launchers listed above please feel free to join our Discord and ask for help in the support section.
